title: IRTrans Remote Command Sender
description:
IRTRANS_SND_1 allows you to send a remote command to the IRTrans. If IN

TRUE the specifed device and key code in setup is sent to the IRTrans

which outputs in turn as a real remote control commands. With T_REPEAT

the repeat time for sending can be specifed . If IN remains constant to

TRUE so always this key code sent repeated after the time T_REPEAT. At

output KEY in active control "1" is passed. KEY = 0 means that the IN is

not active.
name: IRTRANS_SND_1

input.name: IN
input.description: Indicates whether to send the key code (TRUE to send key code)

input.name: T_REPEAT
input.description: The time interval for re-sending the key code

input.name: S_BUF
input.description: Data structure for network buffer to transmit data

input.name: DEV_CODE
input.description: The name of the remote control to be decoded

input.name: KEY_CODE
input.description: The key code to be decoded

output.name: KEY
output.description: The output of the currently active key codes. KEY = 0 means that the IN is not active.
